text_elements.typography_notes: The text is clear and legible with a traditional feel.

symbol.description: Circular emblem with Korean characters and wheat motif

color_palette.contrast_notes: Good contrast with the background, ensuring readability.

layout.balance_notes: Well-balanced with equal emphasis on text and symbol.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate spacing between elements for clarity.

issues.description: Limited color palette may affect visual interest.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Introduce a secondary color for accents.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns well with trends favoring authenticity and tradition.
